headline: OPTI TEMP INC. AIR COOLED CHILLER, 1340 WATT
description: High Temperature Portable Air Cooled Chiller
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Baths and Chillers > Recirculating Chillers
specstable:
Manufacturer Opti Temp Inc.
Model OTC-.5A
Cooling System
External Cooling Air Cooled
Pump type/Model Positive Displacement / P2 Stainless Steel
Cooling Capacity 1,340 W (4,570 BTU/hr)
Minimum Temperature 8 ºC (46 ºF, 281.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 90 ºC (194 ºF, 363 ºK)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 0.200 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Interface RS 232
Controller Manufacturer/Model Love Controls 16A2111996
Max Flow 4 GPM (15.20 l/m)
Minimum Pressure 5.000 PSI (344.77 mbar, 34,476.50 Pa)
Maximum Pressure 60.000 PSI (4,137.18 mbar, 413,718.00 Pa)
Capacity/Liquid 2.84 L (0.75 gal)
Compressor Horse Power 0.50 HP
Accessories 1.5-KW heating element, Dataport, Remote RTD.
Other Information Connections: 0.5" MPT
Refrigerant: R-134A
Power Requirements 240 V 10.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Depth 23.000 in (58.4 cm)
Height 22.500 in (57.2 cm)
Weight 162 lb (73 kg)
